Uses of Interface
org.jfree.chart.block.Arrangement

Packages that use Arrangement
Package
Description
org.jfree.chart
Core classes, including JFreeChart and ChartPanel.
org.jfree.chart.block
Blocks and layout classes used extensively by the LegendTitle class.
org.jfree.chart.plot
Plot classes and related interfaces.
org.jfree.chart.title
Classes used to display chart titles and subtitles.

  • Uses of Arrangement in org.jfree.chart

    Classes in org.jfree.chart that implement Arrangement
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    NestedGridArrangement
    A layout manager that uses a nested grid structure to position chart elements.
    class 
    StandardArrangement
    A chart arrangement that follows the traditional JFreeChart approach of title(s) first, then the plot uses whatever space remains.

  • Uses of Arrangement in org.jfree.chart.block

    Classes in org.jfree.chart.block that implement Arrangement
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BorderArrangement
    An arrangement manager that lays out blocks in a similar way to Swing's BorderLayout class.
    class 
    CenterArrangement
    Arranges a single block in the center of its container.
    class 
    ColumnArrangement
    Arranges blocks in a column layout.
    class 
    FlowArrangement
    Arranges blocks in a flow layout.
    class 
    GridArrangement
    Arranges blocks in a grid within their container.
